product_name: Zoic Juju Novelty Bike Shorts - Women's
long_description: Hidden inside the women's technical Juju Novelty Bike Shorts is the Zoic "essential liner" brief, with its lightly padded chamois for riding comfort and no awkward bulk in the cafe afterward. Stretch shorts fall below the knee; laser-cut, perforated side panels enhance airflow and breathability. Liner shorts are polyester/spandex mesh fabric for comfortable stretch, breathability and wicking. Plush elastic waistband on liner brief feels soft against the skin; inner leg openings feature gripper elastic logos to hold liner in place. Outer shorts have a flat front waistband with an elastic back and side pull-tabs to dial your fit. Gusset inseam panel allows full freedom of movement. Zoic Juju Novelty Bike Shorts for women offer zippered hand pockets with zipper garages for a tidy look.
short_description: Hidden inside the women's technical Juju Novelty Bike Shorts is the Zoic "essential liner" brief, with its lightly padded chamois for riding comfort and no awkward bulk in the cafe afterward.
